'''Radiant Spincrystal 24''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Sun Rises in Liyue]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a rock in Yujing Terrace, [[Liyue Harbor]].
